ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, GLYCERIN, ETHYLHEXYL STEARATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE,BEHENYL ALCOHOL, PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS OIL, STEARYL ALCOHOL,BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER, SODIUM CETEARYL SULFATE, HYDROGENATEDCOCONUT OIL, PLUMERIA RUBRA FLOWER EXTRACT, GARDENIA TAITENSISFLOWER, PARFUM, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, XANTHAN GUM,ALLANTOIN, LECITHIN, CITRIC ACID, TOCOPHEROL, ASCORBYL PALMITATE.

product-info.opis: Odišavljena krema, ki se hitro vpija in neguje obremenjene roke, da postanejo žametno mehke.Dermatološko preizkušeno.
